longBusinessSummary: Sarda Energy & Minerals Limited produces and sells steel products in India. The company product portfolio includes sponge iron, billets and wire rods, ferro alloys, eco-bricks, and HB wires. It is also involved in the coal and iron ore mining, as well as operation of thermal and solar power plants; and offers iron ore pellets. In addition, the company exports its products. Sarda Energy & Minerals Limited was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Raipur, India.
